import "./Dashboard.css"; import Card from "../widgets/Card"; import Linechart from "../widgets/Linechart"; import Piechart from "../widgets/Piechart"; import { FcPackage, FcSalesPerformance, FcList, FcBookmark } from "react-icons/fc"; import Table from "../widgets/Table"; import loan from "../../data/loan.json" const Dashboard = () => { const defaultLabels = ["Current", "Default"] const loanData = loan const status = [...loanData.map(item => item.borrower)] const counts = {}; for (const num of loanData) { counts[num] = counts[num] ? counts[num] + 1 : 1; } console.log(counts) console.log(status) return(

) } export default Dashboard;
